content.text: Chesskippa the Hanger-on is a pirate captain who appears in Robin's flashback.

He is a middle aged man with a bald head. One of his most notable features is his scar that goes over his left eye. He wears a pink shirt with black streaks, which look like splits. Over his shirt he wears a white coat, with yellow, furry pads on the shoulders.

Chesskippa was kind enough to take Nico Robin in to work for his crew, despite her history and large bounty. However, he was angry at and felt betrayed by her when the Marines arrived and arrested him while she fled.
Being a captain of a Grand Line pirate crew, Chesskippa is likely to possess some fighting ability. He also has authority over his crew-mates.

Chesskippa was one of the pirate captains who took in Robin when she was running away from the Marines and the World Government. Later when Robin was targeted by the Marines, he was caught because of her.
